ticketOptions.title: Create Tickets
description: React accordingly with the ticket you want to open.

ticketTypes.name: General Support
description: Please describe your issue so our staff team can assist you.
It may take some time for a staff member to respond to your ticket, so
please be patient, and don't worry about being online when they do.

ticketTypes.name: Punishment Appeals
description: `1.` What platform is your punishment on? (In-game, Discord, etc..)
`2.` What were you punished for?
`3.` If you were banned, what is your Punishment ID? (shown on the ban screen)
`4.` What is your Minecraft username?
`5.` Are you innocent or guilty of breaking the rules?
`6.` Anything else to include?
__Please be patient when waiting for a response to your appeal, and allow__
__up to 48 hours before pinging staff. Do not worry about being online__
__when an appeal member responds.__

ticketTypes.name: Bug Reports
description: `1.` What is your Minecraft username?
`2.` Which platform have you found this bug on? (In-game, Discord, etc..)
`3.` Please describe, in full detail, the bug you have found.
`4.` Do you have any exact step(s) on how to re-create this bug?
`5.` Do you have any other information regarding this?
__Please wait patiently for a moderator to follow up on this report, they__
__will need to ask you some questions regarding this.__
